title: Software Engineer
text:
• Integrated huge data from various sources and unified them in the bigquery (+10TB text data)
  • Create fetching algorithm to fetch data from huge database in less than 10ms increase speed 80%
  • Collaborated to share knowledge and best practices in software development and data handling.

title: Fullstack Engineer
text:
• Designed and implemented the new platform architect with typescript, JavaScript
  • Improved the latency of loading site from 30s to 1s.
  • Mentored newcomers, helping them transition into their roles and gain industry experience.

title: Software Engineer
text:
Sanjagh is an Ad-Network like Outbrain, AdRoll and Taboola, built on top of Digital Ocean Cloud Servers.
  • Led the transition from monolithic to microservices architecture using Golang.
  • Implemented a scalable solution, could handle almost 5000qps requests and reducing costs 60%.
  • Design the Microservice architecture and work as senior developer.
  • Implement some Recommender system Ideaâ€™s which improved the CTR of company ~2.5-3 times.

title: Android Developer
text:
SarAshpazPapion is a recipe social media app in Iran (+1M Downloads).
  • Developing a story (like Instagram) feature in this app which increase daily usage of app by 20%.
  • Improve the performance of the application and make it more user friendly.

title: Software Engineer
text:
AOLab was an IoT platform that founded in the Amirkabir University of Technology.
  • Created platform that you can build your own procedure to do some actions (like shortcut in iOS).
  • Working with raspberry pie and sensors and collect their data.
